name: Nifty Royale X EJ Hassenfratz King Kanis Tiny Kingdom

metadata.description: King Kani loves to dance! But in the open sea, King Kani was always ridiculed for wasting his time dancing when most crabs would be spending time training to use their claws for fighting.  Tired of crabby attitudes, the King eventually decided to leave the sea and create his own tiny peaceful kingdom where he shows off his famous claw dance moves with his closest sea friends!
metadata.name: King Kani's Tiny Kingdom

attributes.value: EJ Hassenfratz is a multi Emmy award winning 3D artist and educator based in Denver, Colorado.  He's been a pillar in the community of motion design with almost 200K subscribers to his Youtube channel where he teaches 3D (even taught Beeple a thing or two). He has been fortunate to have had the opportunity to speak at 3D events across the globe.  His work has been featured in 3D World Magazine and has worked for brands like Nike, Apple, NBA, and Microsoft.
